name: subfinder
description: Subdomain discovery tool using passive sources
longDescription: Subfinder is a subdomain discovery tool that discovers valid subdomains for websites by using passive online sources. It has a simple modular architecture and is optimized for speed.

argsSchema.name: domain
argsSchema.description: Root domain to find subdomains for

prerequisites: Domain must be within authorized scope
Uses only passive sources (no active scanning)
safeUsageNotes: Passive reconnaissance only - no direct contact with target
Results may include historical or inactive subdomains
